(Ex) Credit Card Fraud Detection
▪ A credit card company records the transactions made by every 
credit card holder
– Along with personal information (e.g., credit limit, age, income, address)
▪ Anomaly detection techniques
① Build a profile of legitimate 
transactions for the users
② When a new transaction arrives, 
compare it against the user’s profile
③ If the characteristics of the 
transaction are very different from 
the previously created profile, then 
flag it as potentially fraudulent
